summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Lighting Department; authorizing an agreement with the United States of America, Department of the Interior, acting through the Bonneville Power Administrator, providing for the consent by the City to said Administrator's right to construct, operate and maintain a transmission line right of way across the City's easement right of way in the northeast quarter of the southwest quarter of Section 21, Township 27 North, Range 5 East, W.M., Snohomish County, Washington.
